name: Discover the Old City from a Bright and Airy Apartment
description: Brand new apartment whit a warm, minimalist decor, equipped with everything necessesary to provided confort to both bussines travelers and those who do it for pleassure. It is located in the heart of Palermo Hollywood, an area full off coffe shops, pubs, restaurants, and design shops.

name: Massive villa with a pool
description: Fantastic house in Barcelona with 350 m2 of space, a private pool and a terrace. Private gym, 6 bedrooms. 3 bathrooms. High-speed Wi-Fi. Heating and air conditioning. Fifteen min by bus from downtown Barcelona.

name: Helmholtzplatz / Lychener Straße
description: Next to my place: Berliner Mauer (Berlin wall), Mauerpark, Volkspark am Weinberg, Wasserturm, Nola's, Pizzeria Ristorante Papa Pane di Sorrento, Restaurant Herr Rossi and Schwarze Pumpe. You will like it, my flat has a high ceilings, cozy atmosphere and it's in a great location.

name: Ethnic Studio With 1 Bedroom
description: In the heart of Barcelona, this 1-bedroom apartment is the perfect home base for a romantic getaway. Only a minute from the Sagrada Familia Basilica, and within walking distance of Barcelona’s museums and historical sites, this vacation rental invites you into the city. Inspired by traditional Catalan design, the wooden rafters, colorful shutters, and adobe exterior will transport you to another world. 2 sofa beds make this rental ideal for families or business travelers as well as couples.

name: Sunny Loft with terrace
description: The Loft at the city center is a perfect place for couples, its a private space with its own sunny private terrace, bathroom and full kitchen . it is nearby main local transportation or an easy walk to the old town as well ;)

name: Luxury Casa
description: Country house a 15 minuts of Casablanca. Place to relax with spacious bedrooms, swiming pool, views to the beach where you will arrive to the it in 2 minutes.

name: Attic with terrace in the heart SPb
description: The new attic with a private roof opposite the Peter and Paul fortress, very close to all famous sightseeings of St. Petersburg. In a walking distance from the apartment the underground. Grocery stores, bars and restaurants in the vicinity.See you!

name: Comfortable studio close to the airport, downtown
description: Comfortable studio close to the airport, downtown and many entertainment and cultural places. Includes all the needed services and amenities that will make your stay in Mexico city a great experience.

name: Balestier Near Orchard Modern Studio 2-6PPL C03D
description: It's a modern studio at the city centre super convenient location! Only 10 to 15 mins walking distance or 3 to 5 mins bus to Tan Tock Seng Hospital and Novena or Boonkeng MRT Station, surrounded by convenience store, supermarket & foodcourt, and very close to many attractions.

name: The Elio House - close to Airport/Centre
description: Wake up at a full renovated house just for you and your friends! The house is fully equipped so you can feel like at home at all times. The excellent location will allow you to organize the best trips around the historic city and get to the airport and bus stations quickly.

name: Pool House Oasis in Central Los Angeles
description: Fire up the barbecue and dine al fresco in the private garden by the heated pool. When dinner's over, climb the stairs to the breezy loft bedroom for a peaceful night's sleep. In the morning, pull up a stool and sip some coffee.
